Title: Cooking Up AI Agents in Spreadsheets with Sarah DeAtley, on Mr. Maeda's Cozy AI Kitchen
Description:
In this episode, host John Maeda welcomes Sarah DeAtley, Senior Director of Data and Design at Microsoft, to share a powerful new tool that blends AI agents directly into spreadsheets‚Äîno coding required! Sarah walks us through how this tool simplifies working with text data, enables natural language prompts, and lets users build custom agents for everything from meal planning to data analysis. Whether you're a data scientist, designer, or product manager, this episode shows how AI can supercharge your productivity.

- How to embed and use AI agents directly in spreadsheets
- Why GPT-4.1 works best with this tool
- How to clean and analyze messy survey data with agents
- Ways to use natural language to generate vacation plans
